about_the_game:
Introducing Grumble, the outfit with a bat made of ice cream. That's right, no more rules prohibiting you from satisfying your cravings on the field - this is literally edible equipment! With the Grumble Supporter Pack DLC, you too can enjoy a unique ice cream bat of your own and show off your love for Grumble, the grumpy yet brilliant player who started the ice cream bat revolution.

Plus, by purchasing this pack, you'll be supporting healthy game development and helping us create more awesome, free content for you to enjoy.

Who says rules can't be bent? Get your Grumble DLC now and make your opponents drool with envy!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 GB available space

name: SkyStrikers - Grumble Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700 / AMD Ryzen 3600 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC

short_description: No more rules prohibiting you from satisfying your cravings on the field! Join the ice cream outfit revolution. Get your Grumble DLC now and make your opponents drool with envy! Plus, by purchasing the pack, you'll support healthy game development and get more free, awesome content.
